items.sentence: My brother and I don't get along with each other.
Stay here until I tell you that it's OK to leave.
Some of my students turn in their homework early.
I was kind of hoping we wouldn't have to do this.
I don't want to do that, but I think that I will.
There's little hope that Tom will get any better.
I got fined for parking in front of fire hydrant.
I saw a couple of crazy men fighting in the park.
Almost everyone there thought it was a good idea.
Nearly everyone there thought it was a good idea.
